aboutApp: A women's community for recycling and selling household items such as clothes, dresses, fashion, etc. providing everything you need for event preparation.

getApp.title: Get the App
getApp.subtitle: Scan the QR code to download the app now.

auth.loginSubtitle: Log in to access your account and continue your journey with us.

Conditions1: Welcome to the (occasion) application. Please read the terms and conditions carefully before using the website or application.
Conditions2: Browsing or adding any advertisement on our site constitutes your acknowledgement that you have read and agreed to the terms and conditions.
Conditions3: Ashhan General Trading Company owns an application and a website. (Munassabah) which is a platform that provides advertising space for its users (sellers and buyers)
Conditions4: The role of the (Munsaba application) is limited to providing a space for the seller and buyer to meet in an easy manner and the (Munsaba application) does not bear
Conditions5: The role of the (Munsaba application) is limited to providing a space for the seller and buyer to meet in an easy manner that does not require the (Munsaba application).
Conditions6: No responsibility and no guarantees are provided towards users including the existence of new products and purchase.
Conditions7: It is not referred to to claim compensation for any damage.
Conditions9: Advertisements are listed after registering with a mobile phone number and email. The advertiser must classify the advertisement and publish it under the correct section. The advertisement title, product description, price, and pictures must be written correctly. The product must be real and available.
Conditions10: The seller must be the owner of the services or the service advertisements must be in a commercial capacity or on behalf of others. It is prohibited to publish his advertisements in companies or stores. It contains a ban on publishing advertisements containing words or images that violate public morals or are illegal. It is also prohibited to publish any advertisement for famous people or organizations.
Conditions11: It is prohibited to publish advertisements for the sale of weapons of all kinds, whether licensed or unlicensed. Each advertisement shall be for one item only. In the event of multiple items, an independent advertisement shall be created for each item. It is prohibited to publish advertisements for lawyers that aim to advertise the lawyer himself or work to attract clients.
Conditions12: It is prohibited to publish advertisements that violate the laws in the country where the advertisement originated. It is also prohibited to publish advertisements that violate the laws in the State of Kuwait, especially Law No. 63 of 2015 regarding combating electronic laws and Law No. 38 of 2002 regarding the dissection of the law on advertising health materials. It is prohibited to publish advertisements for medicines and sexual stimulants.
Conditions13: It is prohibited to publish all types of smoking advertisements, whether regular or electronic. It is prohibited to sell endangered plants and animals listed in the CITES agreement, in compliance with the decisions and regulations of the General Environment Authority. It is prohibited to publish advertisements for domestic workers of all types, as well as to publish advertisements for fictitious workers or to rent workers to homes.
Conditions14: It is also forbidden to publish all types of advertisements for gambling, sorcery, or advertisements for magic and sorcery. It is forbidden to publish advertisements for alcohol or alcoholic beverages of all kinds. It is also forbidden to publish advertisements for drugs and hookah of all kinds.
Conditions15: It is prohibited to display and sell eavesdropping devices and means of incitement to misuse telephone devices, according to Law No. 9 of 2001 regarding the misuse of telephone communications devices and eavesdropping devices.
Conditions16: It is prohibited to advertise the repayment of loans and cashing in. It is also prohibited to advertise investment and call for investment and commercial participation.
Conditions17: Because the administration of (Salha Application) is valid for blocking any phone number used to abuse or harm others or in the event that the application is used for illegal purposes, the user takes into account browsers and others.
Conditions18: It is prohibited to reserve ads or reserve installation for the purpose of selling them to another party. The user bears the responsibility of the publisher of the ad for any legal issues or any compensation without any responsibility on the application. (Appropriate)
Conditions19: The customer decides to review all the special and general terms and conditions for using the site’s services and with his limited approval and acceptance of them and decides to bear the legal responsibility “criminal and civil” for any damage caused to the site or the guides or others in the event of violating the laws and regulations.
Conditions20: And the decisions and the organization of advertising and all laws, lists and decisions regulating advertising and all other laws and decisions in force in the country, including his entry into the site or his use of the services available on it, an acknowledgment and pledge from him, easy
Conditions21: The publisher of the advertisement for providing craft works must have obtained a license from the competent authorities to carry out the activity. Users of the application are requested to verify the existence of the necessary documents and licenses before contracting with the providers of craft works. This is without any responsibility on (the appropriate application).
Conditions22: If there is no license to practice the activity for the advertiser of providing craft services. The advertisement will be cancelled and the official employees will be provided with the seller’s data whenever requested by the administration of (the appropriate application). The administration has the right to prevent any user who does not comply with the terms of the application.
Conditions23: Users can also communicate with each other through conversations (chats) and voice messages, and they can also comment on ads and respond to comments.
Conditions24: Users can report inappropriate content or inappropriate people, in addition to the ability to block inappropriate users and not see them or their ads or comments.
